FLPKG.Rmd

FLPKG is an open-source R package that imnplements/provides … It makes use of the S4 classes and methods developed by the FLR project (http://flr-project.org/R, (Kell et al. 2007)), which simplify the development, testing and use of statistical and simulation models for fisheries management advice. […] The package and documentation are available at http://flr-project.org/FLPKG.

Introduction

Background / Methods

This summation expression \(\sum_{i=1}^n X_i\) appears inline.

This summation expression is in display form.

\[\sum_{i=1}^n X_i\]

Using the FLPKG package

More information

  • You can submit bug reports, questions or suggestions on FLPKG at the FLPKG issue page,1 or on the FLR mailing list.
  • Or send a pull request to https://github.com/flr/FLPKG/
  • For more information on the FLR Project for Quantitative Fisheries Science in R, visit the FLR webpage.2
  • The latest version of FLPKG can always be installed using the devtools package, by calling
    library(devtools)
    install_github('flr/FLPKG')

Software Versions

  • R version 4.2.1 (2022-06-23)
  • FLCore: 2.6.19
